thread.title: Trump, after trade talks, says U.S. is being 'nice' with China

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Trump, after trade talks, says U.S. is being 'nice' with China

locations.name: south lawn of the white house

text:
WASHINGTON (Reuters) - U.S. President Donald Trump on Friday said the U.S. was not taking a harder stance against China because of his respect for Chinese President Xi Jinping.
U.S. President Donald Trump speaks to the news media before boarding Marine One to depart for travel to Texas from the South Lawn of the White House in Washington, U.S., May 4, 2018. REUTERS/Leah Millis “I have great respect for President Xi. That’s why we’re being so nice,” Trump told reporters at the White House. His comments came just hours after China announced that large disagreements still loomed over trade between the two countries.
Reporting by Roberta Rampton; Writing by Makini Brice; Editing by Susan Heavey
